member.name: M:Com.Wordsapi.Www.WordsAPI.Api.WordsApi.Details(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: To retrieve a specific set of details of a word. To retrieve a specific set of details of a word, for instance, a word's synonyms, append the detail type to the URL string.
member.param: API key or token for authorization
